text: The Third Half () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Yevgeny Karelov.Летний уикенд на ВДНХ: музыка, поэзия и спортДраму «Третий тайм» показали в КЦ на улице СвободыВ преддверии Дня Победы в Москве пройдут бесплатные киносеансы: что и где посмотреть == Plot == The film shows a real football match between the Germans and the Russians, which occurred on June 22, 1942.Третий тайм == Cast == * Leonid Kuravlyov * Vyacheslav Nevinnyy * Gleb Strizhenov * Yuri Volkov * Vladimir Kashpur * N. Abramov * E. Barens * L. Biryulin * Igor BorisovТретий тайм (1963) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet films Category:1960s sports drama films Category:Russian association football films Category:Sports films based on actual events Category:Soviet sports drama films Category:1962 drama films
title: The Third Half (1962 film)
